name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Gado Gado (Cooked Mixed Vegetables with Peanut Sauce)
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on an Indonesian vegetable dish. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons grated lemon or lime peel
Assorted vegetables such as cabbage, beans, carrots

recipeInstructions.text: Sauté the onion, garlic, coriander, and pinch of cayenne in a little peanut oil. Add the sugar, the peanut butter, a pinch of salt, the milk, 1/2 cup water, and the lemon or lime peel. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, for five minutes.
Briefly parboil a colorful assortment of vegetables: cabbage, beans, carrots, etc. Arrange them on a plate, and chill them in the refrigerator. Serve with the sauce on the side.
